law.text: The board of trustees of each workers' compensation self-insured group shall establish a formal conflict-of-interest policy or code of conduct applicable to the board of trustees, officers, and employees that includes a description of the system used to monitor compliance with the conflict-of-interest policy or code of conduct.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 21, effective March 1, 2005.
